experience.title: Sales
experience.description: A Fintech company, Quantilia provides an innovative online data and portfolio management system, dedicated to institutional investors and single family offices.The platform consolidates your assets, connecting your account with custodians, asset managers and ratings providers. It includes comprehensive index, fund and market data, quantamental and ESG research, as well as powerful analytics and tools specifically developed to assist medium and long term investors to take better informed decisions when managing their portfolios.
